name: swap-helper
notes: Use factors to maintain price ratios; dx is input amount; min-dy is minimum output

name: get-pool-details
notes: Returns balance-x balance-y pool-token total-supply

name: add-to-position
notes: Factors determine price impact; returns LP tokens

name: swap-exact-tokens
notes: Path can include multiple hops; min-out protects against slippage

notes: Min amounts protect against front-running; returns LP tokens

notes: Burns LP tokens; returns underlying tokens

notes: Helper contract simplifies multi-hop swaps

notes: Automatically finds best route

notes: Pool ID 0 is main pool; receives interest-bearing tokens

notes: Requires collateral; interest accrues per block

notes: Returns total-supplied total-borrowed interest-rate

notes: Liquid stacking; stSTX auto-compounds rewards

notes: Burns stSTX; may have cooldown period

notes: Fast Pool variant with higher APY

name: swap-tokens
notes: Meme token DEX; high slippage possible

name: alex-swap-tx
code: const txOptions = { contractAddress: 'SP102V8P0F7JX67ARQ77WEA3D3CFB5XW39REDT0AM' contractName: 'amm-swap-pool-v1-1' functionName: 'swap-helper' functionArgs: [contractPrincipalCV(tokenXAddress tokenXName) contractPrincipalCV(tokenYAddress tokenYName) uintCV(100000000) uintCV(100000000) uintCV(amountIn) uintCV(minAmountOut)] network }; const tx = await makeContractCall(txOptions)
notes: Factors are pool-specific; query pool details first

name: velar-swap-tx
code: const path = [contractPrincipalCV('SP...', 'token-a') contractPrincipalCV('SP...', 'token-b')]; const txOptions = { contractAddress: 'SP1Y5YSTAHZ88XYK1VPDH24GY0HPX5J4JECTMY4A1' contractName: 'univ2-router' functionName: 'swap-exact-tokens-for-tokens' functionArgs: [uintCV(amountIn) uintCV(minAmountOut) listCV(path)] network }; const tx = await makeContractCall(txOptions)
imports_or_contract: import { makeContractCall uintCV listCV contractPrincipalCV } from '@stacks/transactions'
notes: Path supports multi-hop swaps; calculate min-out with slippage tolerance

name: velar-add-liquidity-tx
description: Add liquidity to Velar via SDK
code: const txOptions = { contractAddress: 'SP1Y5YSTAHZ88XYK1VPDH24GY0HPX5J4JECTMY4A1' contractName: 'univ2-router' functionName: 'add-liquidity' functionArgs: [contractPrincipalCV(tokenAAddr tokenAName) contractPrincipalCV(tokenBAddr tokenBName) uintCV(amountA) uintCV(amountB) uintCV(minA) uintCV(minB)] network }; const tx = await makeContractCall(txOptions)
notes: Set min amounts to ~2% less to handle price movements

name: alex-pool-info
description: Get Alex pool info via API
code: const response = await fetch('https://api.alexlab.co/v1/pool_tokens'); const pools = await response.json(); const pool = pools.find(p => p.token0 === tokenX && p.token1 === tokenY)
notes: Returns reserve0 reserve1 totalSupply volume24h

name: velar-pool-info
description: Get Velar pool info via API
code: const response = await fetch('https://api.velar.co/v1/pools'); const pools = await response.json(); const pool = pools.find(p => p.pair === `${token0}-${token1}`)
notes: Returns liquidity volume24h priceChange24h

name: bitflow-swap-tx
code: const txOptions = { contractAddress: 'SP3K8BC0PPEVCV7NZ6QSRWPQ2JE9E5B6N3PA0KBR9' contractName: 'swap-helper-v1-03' functionName: 'swap-helper' functionArgs: [contractPrincipalCV(tokenInAddr tokenInName) contractPrincipalCV(tokenOutAddr tokenOutName) uintCV(amountIn) uintCV(minAmountOut)] network }; const tx = await makeContractCall(txOptions)
notes: Helper auto-routes through best pools

name: stackingdao-deposit-sdk
code: const txOptions = { contractAddress: 'SP4SZE494VC2YC5JYG7AYFQ44F5Q4PYV7DVMDPBG' contractName: 'stacking-dao-core-v1' functionName: 'deposit' functionArgs: [uintCV(amountMicroStx)] network }; const tx = await makeContractCall(txOptions); const broadcast = await broadcastTransaction({ transaction: tx network })
notes: Receive stSTX at 1:1 ratio; stSTX value increases over time from rewards

name: stackingdao-exchange-rate
code: const response = await fetch('https://api.stackingdao.com/v1/info'); const info = await response.json(); const exchangeRate = info.stx_per_ststx
notes: Returns current STX/stSTX exchange rate and APY

name: Calculate minimum output with slippage
description: function calculateMinOut(expectedAmount slippagePercent) { return Math.floor(expectedAmount * (1 - slippagePercent / 100)) }
imports_or_contract: Common slippage: 0.5-2%; use higher for volatile pairs

name: Find best swap route across DEXs
description: const response = await fetch(`https://api.stacksswap.xyz/v1/route?from=${tokenIn}&to=${tokenOut}&amount=${amount}`); const route = await response.json(); console.log(route.path route.expectedOutput route.priceImpact)
imports_or_contract: Aggregator finds optimal path across Alex Velar Bitflow
